Creating 5.3/6.0 Folders

When working with a 5.3/6.0 project root that you have not upgraded to a project database, you can use the current version of Serena ChangeMan Version Manager to create new folders to organize your work. When you create a new folder in this way, it is recognized by Version Manager 5.3/6.0. New folder names must be unique within the project in which they reside.

To create a folder:

  1. In the Project pane, select the 5.3/6.0 project in which you want to create the folder.
     

  2. Select File | Create Folder. The Create Folder dialog box appears.
     

  3. Enter a name in the Name field. For more information on what characters should not be used in Version Manager names, see Naming Conventions.
     

  4. Enter a location for the folder's workfiles in the Workfile Location field.
     

  5. Click OK.
